trait.name: Mountain Born
entries: Aruk is acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000 feet.

trait.name: Powerful Build
entries: Aruk counts as one size larger when determining his carrying capacity and the weight he can push, drag, or lift.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Aruk fa dos atacs with his greataxe or hurls two javelins.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Stone's Endurance (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: When Aruk takes damage, it reduces the damage taken by 9 ({@dice 1d12 + 3}).

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de Auril és Carisma ({@dc 21} salvada de conjur, {@hit 13} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):
will: {@spell esfera cromàtica} (cold orb only; see "Actions" below)

trait.name: Divine Being
entries: Auril can't be surprised and can't be changed into another form against her will.

trait.name: Divine Rejovenir
entries: When Auril es queda a 0 punts de cop, her body turns to slush and melts away. Auril instantly reappears in her {@creature Auril (second form)|idrotf|second form}, in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of where her first form disappeared. Her initiative count doesn't change.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (2/Dia en aquesta forma)
entries: Si Auril falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Auril té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Naturalesa Inusual
entries: Auril no necessita aire, menjar, beure, ni dormir.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Auril attacks twice with her talons.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Touch of Frost
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 13} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany de fred, and the target can't take reactions fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

action.name: Esfera Cromàtica
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 13} a impactar, 90 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany de fred.

legendary.name: Talons
entries: Auril attacks once with her talons.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: Auril teleports to an unoccupied space she can see within 30 feet of her.

legendary.name: Touch of Frost (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Auril uses Touch of Frost.

trait.name: Divine Being
entries: Auril can't be surprised and can't be changed into another form against her will.

trait.name: Divine Rejovenir
entries: When Auril es queda a 0 punts de cop, her body collapses into shards of ice, whereupon Auril instantly reappears in her {@creature Auril (third form)|idrotf|third form}, in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of where her second form was destroyed. Her initiative count doesn't change.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (2/Dia en aquesta forma)
entries: Si Auril falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Auril té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Naturalesa Inusual
entries: Auril no necessita aire, menjar, beure, ni dormir.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Auril attacks twice with her ice morningstar or hurls three ice darts.

action.name: Ice Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Ice Dard
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Con de Fred (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Auril causes a magical blast of cold air to erupt from her hand. Each creature en un con de 60 peus ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 21}. Qui falli rep 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany de fred; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Create Ice Mephit (3/Dia)
entries: Auril breaks off an icicle from her body and hurls it into an unoccupied space she can see within 20 feet of her, where it magically transforms into an {@creature ice mephit} (see its entry in the Monster Manual). The mephit acts immediately after Auril in the initiative order and obeys her commands.

action.name: Ice Stasis {@recharge 5}
entries: Auril magically creates a gem-sized ice crystal that hovers in a space within 5 feet of her. Auril then targets a creature she can see within 60 feet of the crystal. The target ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 21} or become trapped in the crystal, which is immovable. If the saving throw succeeds, the crystal shatters and nothing else happens. A creature trapped in the crystal is {@condition stunned}, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the crystal, and takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany de fred a l'inici de cada torn seu. The creature can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, freeing itself on a success. The creature is also freed if the crystal is destroyed, which is a Tiny object with AC 18, 9 hit points, and immunity to all damage except fire damage. The freed creature apareix en un espai desocupat of its choice within 30 feet of the shattered crystal.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Auril makes one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Ice Flurry (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Each creature within 30 feet of Auril takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany perforant from swirling ice, and nonmagical, open flames in that area are extinguished.

legendary.name: Splinter (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Auril uses Create Ice Mephit or causes one to ice mephit she can see within 60 feet of her to explode and die. A mephit that dies in this way does not use its Cadàver Detonant. Instead, each creature within 10 feet of the exploding mephha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 21}, taking 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany perforant on a failed saving throw, and half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Auril (Third Form)
senses: visió a cegues 120 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Divine Being
entries: Auril can't be surprised and can't be changed into another form against her will.

trait.name: Divine Resurrection
entries: When Auril es queda a 0 punts de cop, her crystalline form shatters and her divine spark vanishes. She is dead until the next winter solstice, when she reappears at full health in a cold, remote location of her choosing.

trait.name: Frigid Aura
entries: So long as Auril has at least 1 hit point in this form, each creature within 10 feet of her takes 10 cold damage a l'inici de cada torn seu.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (1/Dia en aquesta forma)
entries: Si Auril falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Auril té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Naturalesa Inusual
entries: Auril no necessita aire, menjar, beure, ni dormir.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Auril uses Polar Ray twice.

action.name: Polar Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 13} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Blizzard Veil
entries: Auril creates a magical blizzard in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on herself. The area within the sphere is heavily obscured, and the sphere moves with Auril. The effect lasts until Auril es queda a 0 punts de cop in this form, until she chooses to end the effect (no requereix acció), or until her concentration is broken (as if concentrating on a spell).

legendary.name: Polar Ray
entries: Auril uses Polar Ray.

legendary.name: Intensify Aura (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Auril's Frigid Aura deals an extra 10 cold damage until the end of her next turn.

legendary.name: Blinding Gleam (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Auril's form flares with a blue light. Each creature that can see Auril and is within 10 feet of her ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17} or be {@condition blinded} by Auril's magical gleam for 1 minute. La criatura {@condition blinded} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Avarice és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 10. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència (spell save {@dc 14}; {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Icy Doom
entries: When Avarice dies, her corpse freezes for 9 days, during which time it can't be thawed, harmed by fire, animated, or raised from the dead.

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Avarice wields a {@item staff of frost} with 10 charges (see "Actions" below).

action.name: Sageta de Foc (Truc)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Staff of Frost
entries: While holding this staff, Avarice can expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it ({@dc 14} salvació de conjur): {@spell con de fred} (5 charges), {@spell núvol de boira} (1 charge), {@spell tempesta de gel} (4 charges), or {@spell wall of ice} (4 charges). The staff regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} charges daily at dawn. If its last charge is expended, roll a {@dice d20}; on a 1, the staff turns to water and is destroyed.

reaction.name: Banishing Rebuke (es Recarrega amb un Descans Llarg)
entries: When Avarice is damaged by a creature that she can see within 60 feet of her, she can banish that creature to a frigid extradimensional prison for 1 minute. While there, the creature is {@condition incapacitated} and takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de fred a l'inici de cada torn seu. Al final de cada torn seu, the creature can make a {@dc 14} Carisma saving throw, escaping the prison on a success and reappearing in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied. A creature that dies in the prison is trapped there indefinitely.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the moose moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with an antlers attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 14} or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The moose has advantage on Força and Destresa saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The moose fa dos atacs: one with its antlers and one with its hooves.

action.name: Antlers
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The dwarf has advantage on Saviesa (Percepció) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: The dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance against poison damage.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The dwarf makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6 + 0}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Ballesta Lleugera
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, ranged 80/320 ft., un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Auril's Blessing (3/Dia)
entries: When Bjornhild hits a creature with a weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Bjornhild fa dos atacs armats melé.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) de dany tallant, mes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de fred if Bjornhild uses Auril's Blessing.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, o 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac melé, plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de fred if Bjornhild uses Auril's Blessing.

monster.name: Cervell en Conserva
senses: visió a cegues 120 peus (sense visió més enllà); see also "detectar consciència" below
languages: the languages it knew in life

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The brain és Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

trait.name: Detectar Consciència
entries: The brain can sense the presence and location of any creature within 300 feet of it that has an Intel·ligència of 3 or higher, regardless of interposing barriers, unless the creature is protected by a ment en blanc spell.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The brain has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects.

trait.name: Naturalesa Inusual
entries: The brain no necessita aire, menjar, beure, ni dormir.

action.name: Mà Morta (Truc)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany necròtic, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the brain's next turn. If the target is undead, it also has disadvantage on attack rolls against the brain until the end of the brain's next turn.

action.name: Explosió Mental {@recharge 5}
entries: The brain emet energia psíquica màgicament en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Intel·ligència de {@dc 14}. Qui falli rep 17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) de dany psíquic i està {@condition stunned} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament qui superi.

trait.name: Chardalyn Madness
entries: The berserker must roll a {@dice d6} a l'inici de cada torn seu. On a 1, the berserker does nothing on its turn except speak to a nonexistent, evil master whom it has pledged to serve.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: A l'inici del seu torn, the berserker can gain advantage on all atac armat melé rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The berserker attacks three times with a melee weapon.

action.name: Chardalyn Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 13} o be {@condition poisoned} fins el final del seu proper torn.

action.name: Chardalyn Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 13} o be {@condition poisoned} fins el final del seu proper torn.

monster.name: Chardalyn Dragon
languages: the languages known by its creator

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The dragon és immune a tot conjur o efecte que vulgui alterar-li la forma.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The dragon té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The dragon fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

trait.name: Naturalesa Inusual
entries: The dragon no necessita aire, menjar, beure, ni dormir, and it gains no benefit from finishing a short or long rest.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The dragon uses its Malevolent Presence. It then fa tres atacs: two with its claws and one with its tail. If the dragon isn't flying, it can also make one attack with its wings.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Wings
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d4 + 7}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Malevolent Presence
entries: Any creature with an Intel·ligència of 4 or more that is within 30 feet of the dragon ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16} or be {@condition charmed} by it for 1 minute. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. Si la criatura supera la salvació o l'efecte acaba prematurament, la criatura és immune a dragon's Malevolent Presence durant les properes 24 hores. A creature {@condition charmed} in this way fixates on another creature or object that the dragon mentally chooses and must, on each of its turns, move as close as it can to that target and use its action to make a melee attack against it. If the dragon doesn't choose a target, the {@condition charmed} creature can act normally on its turn.

action.name: Alè de Radiant {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhala un raig d'energia radiant en una línia de 120 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 16}. Qui falli rep 31 ({@damage 7d8}) de dany radiant; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The baboon té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de baboon's no {@condition incapacitated} a 5 peus.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) de dany perforant, mes an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de verí.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The cat té avantatge a tirades de Saviesa (Percepció) que involucrin olor.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 de dany tallant.

trait.name: Oïda Aguda
entries: The fox té avantatge a tirades de Saviesa (Percepció) que involucrin l'oïda.

trait.name: Chimeric Creació
entries: The fox has fur that changes color to match its surroundings, giving it advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Escape
entries: The hare can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The rat té avantatge a tirades de Saviesa (Percepció) que involucrin olor.

trait.name: Chimeric Creació
entries: The rat has gills, iridescent scales, and the ability to breathe air and water.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Oïda i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The weasel té avantatge a tirades de Saviesa (Percepció) que involucrin l'oïda o l'olfacte.

trait.name: Chimeric Creació
entries: The weasel has glowing eyes that emit bright light out in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Blinding Light
entries: The walker desprèn llum forta en un radi de 20 peus i llum tènue uns 20 peus adicionals. Com a acció bonus, the walker can target one creature in its bright light that it can see and force it to succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the start of the walker's next turn.

trait.name: Icy Doom
entries: Any creature killed by the walker freezes for 9 days, during which time it can't be thawed, harmed by fire, animated, or raised from the dead.

trait.name: Naturalesa Inusual
entries: The walker no necessita aire, menjar, beure, ni dormir.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The walker fa dos atacs.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) de dany contundent mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Cold Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 3} a impactar, 60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d10 + 3}) de dany de fred.

monster.name: Demos Magen
languages: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Fiery End
entries: If the magen dies, its body disintegrates in a harmless burst of fire and smoke, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The magen té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Naturalesa Inusual
entries: The magen no necessita aire, menjar, beure, ni dormir.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The magen fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Espasa Gran
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Ballesta Lleugera
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Shocking Grasp (Truc)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one creature (the attack roll has advantage if the target is wearing armor made of metal). {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany elèctric, and the target can't take reactions fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

action.name: Esquitx Àcid (Truc)
entries: Dzaan hurls a bubble of acid at one creature he can see within 60 feet of it, or at two such creatures that are within 5 feet of each other. A target ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13} or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany d'àcid.

action.name: Missil Màgic (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
entries: Dzaan creates three darts of magical force. Each dart unerringly strikes one creature Dzaan can see within 120 feet of it, dealing 3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany de força. If Dzaan casts this spell using a 2nd-level spell slot, he creates one more dart.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs

action.name: Shocking Grasp (Truc)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one creature (the attack roll has advantage if the target is wearing armor made of metal). {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany elèctric, and the target can't take reactions fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

action.name: Esquitx Àcid (Truc)
entries: The simulacrum hurls a bubble of acid at one creature it can see within 60 feet of it, or at two such creatures that are within 5 feet of each other. A target ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13} or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany d'àcid.

action.name: Missil Màgic (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
entries: The simulacrum creates three darts of magical force. Each dart unerringly strikes one creature the simulacrum can see within 120 feet of it, dealing 3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany de força. If the simulacrum casts this spell using a 2nd-level spell slot, it creates one more dart.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Només en Forma Humanoide)
headerEntries: The druid és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (spell save {@dc 14}; {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de druida preparats:

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The druid fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Ice Sickle (Només en Forma Humanoide)

action.name: Maul (Només en forma de Beast)

Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the beast form (the druid's choice). It reverts to its humanoid form when it dies. The druid's statistics are the same in each form, except where noted in this stat block.

Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 14} (with disadvantage if the creature is wearing armor made of metal). Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The vampire té avantatge a tirades de Saviesa (Percepció) que involucrin olor.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the vampire can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The vampire recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn si it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire rep dany radiant o d'aigua beneïda, aquest tret no funciona fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: If the vampire isn't in sunlight, it can use its action to polymorph into a Large hyena or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into its true form.

While in hyena form, the vampire can't speak, and its walking speed is 50 feet. Its statistics, other than its size and speed, are unchanged. Anything it is wearing transforms with it, but nothing it is carrying does. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

While in mist form, the vampire can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. it is weightless, has una velocitat de vol de 20 peus, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can't pass through water. It has advantage on Força, Destresa, and Constitució saving throws, and it is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.

trait.name: Naturalesa Inusual
entries: The vampire doesn't require air.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: The vampire has the following flaws:

{@i Enraged by Celestial.} If it hears words of Celestial spoken, the vampire must try to attack the source of those spoken words on its next turn. If these words come from multiple sources and from opposite directions, the vampire is {@condition restrained}. Otherwise, it moves to attack what it perceives to be the closest source.
{@i Repulsed by Perfume.} The vampire has disadvantage on melee attack rolls made against any creature wearing perfume or carrying an open container of it.

{@i Stake to the Heart.} If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire is {@condition incapacitated} in its resting place, the vampire is {@condition paralyzed} until the stake is removed.
{@i Sunlight Hypersensitivity.} The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. it té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar and ability checks.

action.name: Multiattack (Només en forma de Vampire)
entries: The vampire fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada (Només en forma de Hyena or Vampire)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany perforant mes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany necròtic. Els punts de cop màxims de l'objectiu es redueixen tant com dany necròtic hagi rebut, i el vampir en recupera aquest número. La reducció dura fins que l'objectiu acabi un descans llarg. the target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

action.name: Urpes (Només en forma de Vampire)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Frightful Cackle (Només en forma de Hyena or Vampire)
entries: The vampire emits a bone-chilling cackle. Each creature of the vampire's choice that is within 120 feet of the vampire and can hear its cackle ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 15} o estar {@condition frightened} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. Si la criatura supera la salvació o l'efecte acaba prematurament, la criatura és immune a vampire's Frightful Cackle durant les properes 24 hores.

action.name: Sickening Gaze (Només en forma de Hyena or Vampire)
entries: The vampire targets one humanoid it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the vampire, the target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15} against this magic or be {@condition poisoned} for 24 hours. A creature whose saving throw is successful is immune to this vampire's Sickening Gaze for 24 hours.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The ceremorph és Intel·ligència ({@dc 15} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The ceremorph té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Tentacles

If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 9} per escapar) and ha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 15} or be {@condition stunned} mentre duri aquesta presa.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one {@condition incapacitated} humanoid {@condition grappled} by the ceremorph. {@h}55 ({@damage 10d10}) de dany perforant. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the ceremorph kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) de dany psíquic i està {@condition stunned} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament qui superi.

entries: When the cultist dies, its corpse freezes for 9 days, during which time it can't be thawed, harmed by fire, animated, or raised from the dead.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The fanatic fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Respirar sota l'aigua
entries: The trout can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The vampire té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de vampire's no {@condition incapacitated} a 5 peus.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The vampire recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn si it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire rep dany radiant o d'aigua beneïda, aquest tret no funciona fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

trait.name: Naturalesa Inusual
entries: The vampire doesn't require air.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: The vampire has the following flaws:
{@i Prohibició.} The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.
{@i Harmed by Running Water.} The vampire takes 20 acid damage when it starts its turn in running water.
{@i Stake to the Heart.} The vampire is destroyed if a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into its heart while it is {@condition incapacitated} in its resting place.
{@i Sunlight Hypersensitivity.} The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. it té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar and ability checks.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany necròtic. Els punts de cop màxims de l'objectiu es redueixen tant com dany necròtic hagi rebut, i el vampir en recupera aquest número. La reducció dura fins que l'objectiu acabi un descans llarg. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The living spell té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Naturalesa Inusual
entries: The living spell no necessita aire, menjar, beure, ni dormir.

action.name: Force Fist
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d8 + 8}) de dany de força. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the living spell can move it up to 5 feet and move with it, sense provocar atacs d'oportunitat.

action.name: Grasping Hand
entries: The living spell attempts to grab a Huge or smaller creature within 5 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 15} or be {@condition grappled} ({@dc 15} per escapar). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) de dany contundent a l'inici de cada torn seu. The living spell can grapple only one creature at a time and can't use Force Fist until the grapple ends.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The living spell té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Unfettered
entries: The living spell can move through any barrier, even a wall of magical force.

trait.name: Naturalesa Inusual
entries: The living spell no necessita aire, menjar, beure, ni dormir.

action.name: Force Blade
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d12}) de dany de força, unless the living spell rolled an 18 or higher on the {@dice d20} for the attack, in which case the attack is a critical hit that deals 78 ({@damage 12d12}) de dany de força instead.

reaction.name: Preemptive Strike
entries: The living spell makes a melee attack against a creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the living spell.

trait.name: Dimensional Form
entries: The living spell can enter another creature's space and vice versa, and it pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema. The living spell can't detach from a solid surface, such as a wall, ceiling, or floor. If it has no surface to attach to, the living spell is destroyed (see "Planar Destruction" below).

trait.name: Extradimensional Chamber
entries: When the living spell enters another creature's space (or vice versa) for the first time on a turn, the other creature ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 10} or be pulled into the living spell's extradimensional space, an unfurnished stone chamber 30 feet in every dimension. A creature too big to fit in this space succeeds on the saving throw automatically. Creatures in the chamber never run out of breathable air. Magic that enables transit between planes, such as saltar de pla, can be used to escape the chamber, which has no exits otherwise. Creatures trapped inside the extradimensional chamber can't see, target, or deal damage to the living spell; however, they can damage the room around them. Each 5-foot-square section of ceiling, wall, and floor in the chamber has AC 17, 50 hit points, immunity to poison and psychic damage, and immunity to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage that is nonmagical. If any section is reduced to 0 hit points, the living spell and its chamber are destroyed (see "Planar Destruction" below).

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The living spell té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Planar Destruction
entries: The living spell is destroyed when it or a 5-foot-square section of its extradimensional chamber is reduced to 0 hit points, or when the living spell has no surface to attach to. When the living spell is destroyed, the contents of its extradimensional chamber are expelled, appearing as close to the living spell's previous location as possible. Each expelled creature appears in a randomly determined unoccupied space, along with whatever it is wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Naturalesa Inusual
entries: The living spell no necessita aire, menjar, beure, ni dormir.

trait.name: Detect Life
entries: The banshee can magically sense the presence of creatures up to 5 miles away that aren't undead or constructs. She knows the general direction they're in but not their exact locations.

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The banshee pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. She takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força if she ends her turn inside an object.

action.name: Spectral Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d6 + 2}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Albir Terrorífic
entries: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of the banshee that can see her ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 13} or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, with disadvantage if the banshee is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the banshee's Albir Terrorífic durant les properes 24 hores.

action.name: Wail (1/Dia)
entries: The banshee releases a mournful wail, provided that she isn't in sunlight. This wail has no effect on constructs and undead. All other creatures within 30 feet of her that can hear her ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13}. On a failure, a creature es queda a 0 punts de cop. On a success, a creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany psíquic.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Mjenir és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 4. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de druida preparats:

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar ({@hit 4} a impactar amb shillelagh), 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent, 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany contundent if wielded with two hands, o 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany contundent amb shillelagh.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: Si the goat es mou 20 peus com a mínim directe cap a un objectiu i l'impacta amb un ram, tot al mateix torn, the target takes an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 12} or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The goat has advantage on Força and Destresa saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition prone}.

action.name: Envestir
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The ghost és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 6. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvació de conjur). The ghost has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Visió Etèrea
entries: The ghost pot veure el Pla Etèri fins a 60 peus d'abast quan està al Pla Material (i viceversa).

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The ghost pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Rep 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el seu torn dins d'un objecte.

action.name: Toc Pansidor
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Eterietat
entries: The ghost entra el Pla Etèri des del Pla Material (i viceversa). És visible des del Pla Material quan està al Llindar Eteri (i viceversa). Tanmateix no pot afectar ni ésser afectat per res de l'altre pla.

action.name: Albir Terrorífic
entries: Tota criatura no no-morta a 60 peus de the ghost que pugui veure'l ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 14}. Qui falli estarà {@condition frightened} durant 1 minut. Qui falli per més de 5 també envelleix {@dice 1d4 × 10} anys. Les criatures {@condition frightened} poden repetir la salvada al final de cada torn, cancel·lan l'efecte {@condition frightened} quan superin.If the target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this ghost's Albir Terrorífic durant les properes 24 hores. The aging effect can be reversed by a restabliment superior spell, but only if it is cast within 24 hours.

action.name: Posseïr {@recharge}
entries: One humanoid that the ghost can see within 5 feet of ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 14} or be possessed by the ghost; the ghost then disappears, and the target is {@condition incapacitated} and loses control of its body. The ghost now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The ghost no pot ser objectiu de cap atac, conjur, o efecte excepte els que expulsen no-morts, and retè l'alineament, la Intel·ligència, la Saviesa, el Carisma, i la immunitat a ésser {@condition charmed} o {@condition frightened}. La resta d'estadístiques són les de l'objectiu, però no en guanya els coneixements, trets de classes, o competències. La possessió dura fins que el cos es quedi a 0 punts de toc, the ghost la cancel·li com a acció bonus, o the ghost sigui expulsat per un efecte com el de dissipar el bé i el mal spell. Quan la possessió acaba the ghost reapareix en un espai lliure a 5 peus del cos. L'objectiu és immune a possessions d'aquest this ghost's durant 24 hores des que supera la salvada o la possessió acaba.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Prisoner 237 és un llançador de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència (spell save {@dc 13}; {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:
footerEntries: *Prisoner 237 needs material components to cast these spells.

action.name: Shocking Grasp (Truc)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} a impactar (with advantage on the attack if the target is wearing armor made of metal), 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany elèctric, and the target can't take reactions fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

trait.name: Coratge
entries: The chieftain has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the chieftain hits with it (included in the attack).

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The chieftain makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast i 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, o 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac melé.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de dany contundent. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 15} or be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The chieftain adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the chieftain must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Coratge
entries: The great warrior has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the great warrior hits with it (included in the attack).

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The great warrior makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast i 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, o 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac melé.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de dany contundent. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 15} or be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The great warrior adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the great warrior must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The druid és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 4. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de druida preparats:

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar ({@hit 4} a impactar amb shillelagh), 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent, 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany contundent if wielded with two hands, o 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany contundent amb shillelagh.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The warrior té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de warrior's no {@condition incapacitated} a 5 peus.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac melé.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The seal pot aguantar la respiració durant 15 minuts.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The seal té avantatge a tirades de Saviesa (Percepció) que involucrin olor.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Sephek can innately cast {@spell pas boira} up to three times per day, sense requerir components. His habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata is Carisma.

trait.name: Cold Regeneració
entries: If the temperature around him is 0 degrees Fahrenheit or lower, Sephek recupera 5 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If he takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of Sephek's next turn. Sephek dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Sephek attacks twice with a weapon.

action.name: Ice Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant if Sephek uses the weapon with two hands, plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Ice Daga
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany de fred.

monster.name: Snow Gòlem
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Cold Absorption
entries: Whenever the gòlem is subjected to cold damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the cold damage dealt.

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The gòlem és immune a tot conjur o efecte que vulgui alterar-li la forma.

trait.name: Melt
entries: While in an area of extreme heat, the gòlem loses {@dice 1d6} hit points a l'inici de cada torn seu.

trait.name: Naturalesa Inusual
entries: The gòlem no necessita aire, menjar, beure, ni dormir.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The gòlem fa tres atacs melé.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Snowball
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 0} a impactar, 60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany de fred.

trait.name: Oída i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The snowy owlbear té avantatge en tirades de Saviesa (Percepció) que involucrin vista o olfacte.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The snowy owlbear fa dos atacs: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany tallant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Spellix's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Astúcia Gnoma
entries: Spellix has advantage on all Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma saving throws against magic.

action.name: Shocking Grasp (Truc)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} a impactar (with advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal), 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany elèctric, and the target can't take reactions fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

action.name: Sageta de Foc (Truc)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc. Un objecte flamable impactat per aquest encanteri s'encèn si no és dut ni vestit.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The whale can't use its visió a cegues while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The whale pot aguantar la respiració durant 90 minuts.

trait.name: Oïda Aguda
entries: The whale té avantatge a tirades de Saviesa (Percepció) que involucrin l'oïda.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The whale fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 14} or be swallowed by the whale. A swallowed creature has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the whale, and it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the whale's turns. Si the whale rep 30 o més de dany en un sol torn d'una criatura a dins seu, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16} al final del torn. Si falla, regurgita tota criatura empassada, que queden {@condition prone} a 10 peus d'abast de the whale. If the whale dies, a swallowed creature can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d6 + 8}) de dany contundent, o 37 ({@damage 6d6 + 16}) de dany contundent if the target is an object.

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Adhesive (Només en forma d'objecte)
entries: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also {@condition grappled} by it ({@dc 16} per escapar). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença (Només en forma d'objecte)
entries: Quan the mimic es manté immòbil, és indistingible d'un object ordinary.

trait.name: Grappler
entries: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature {@condition grappled} by it.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The mimic té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The mimic attacks three times: twice with its pseudòpodes and once with its bite.

action.name: Pseudòpodes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) de dany contundent. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) de dany perforant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany d'àcid.

action.name: Spit Acid {@recharge 5}
entries: The mimic spits acid at one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 14}, taking 32 ({@damage 9d6 + 1}) de dany d'àcid on failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The Telepathic Pentacle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Caps Múltiples
entries: The Telepathic Pentacle has five heads. While it has more than one head, the Telepathic Pentacle has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.
Whenever the Telepathic Pentacle takes 25 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the Telepathic Pentacle dies.

At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire damage since its last turn. The Telepathic Pentacle regains 10 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: For each head the Telepathic Pentacle has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the Telepathic Pentacle sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The Telepathic Pentacle makes as many bite attacks as it has heads.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Tomb Tapper
senses: visió a cegues 240 peus (sense visió més enllà)
languages: understands Common and Undercommon but doesn't speak

trait.name: Petrified Death
entries: A tomb tapper reduced to 0 hit points turns into a lifeless stone statue. Anything it's wearing or carrying is not transformed.

trait.name: Sense Magic
entries: The tomb tapper senses magic within 30 feet of it and can use an action to pinpoint the location of any creature, object, or area in that range that bears magic. This sense penetrates barriers but is blocked by una fulla fina de plom.

trait.name: Tuneladora
entries: The tomb tapper can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-wide, 20-foot-tall tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Naturalesa Inusual
entries: The tomb tapper doesn't require air or sleep.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The tomb tapper makes two melee attacks with its sledgehammer or with its claws. If it hits the same creature with both claws, it can pull that creature within 5 feet of its mouth and make a bite attack against it.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Sledgehammer
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d6 + 6}) bludgeoning or force damage (tomb tapper's choice). If thrown, the hammer returns to the tomb tapper at the end of its turn, landing at the tomb tapper's feet if it doesn't have a hand free to catch the weapon.

monster.name: Guerrer Tribal Spore Servants
senses: visió a cegues 30 peus (sense visió més enllà)

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac melé.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Vellynne is an 8th-level spellcaster. Her habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Vellynne wears bracers of defense and carries a wand of missils màgics (see "Actions" below).

action.name: Vampiric Touch (3rd-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic, and Vellynne regains hit points equal to half the necrotic damage dealt. If Vellynne casts this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the necrotic damage increases by {@dice 1d6} per cada nivell per sobre de 3.

action.name: Mà Morta (Truc)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany necròtic, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of Vellynne's next turn.

action.name: Wand of Missils Màgics
entries: While holding this wand, Vellynne can expend 1 or more of its 7 charges to cast the missil màgic spell from it. She can expend 1 charge to cast the 1st-level version of the spell. She can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge she expends. The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn. If the wand's last charge is expended, roll a {@dice d20}; on a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The verbeeg és Saviesa. Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

trait.name: Simple Weapon Wielder
entries: A simple weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the verbeeg hits with it (included in the attack).

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The verbeeg fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, o 17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) de dany perforant if used to make a ranged attack or used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Fona
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 3d4 + 2}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15} or be {@condition stunned} fins el final del seu proper torn.

trait.name: Simple Weapon Wielder
entries: A simple weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the verbeeg hits with it (included in the attack).

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The verbeeg fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, o 17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) de dany perforant if used to make a ranged attack or used with two hands to make a melee attack.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The walrus pot aguantar la respiració durant 10 minuts.

action.name: Ullals
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de Xardorok és Carisma ({@dc 15} salvada de conjur, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Duergar Resilience
entries: Xardorok has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being {@condition charmed} or {@condition paralyzed}.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: Xardorok té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as on Saviesa (Percepció) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Xardorok attacks twice with a weapon or casts missil èldritx twice.

action.name: Spiked Gauntlet
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant, o 8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) de dany perforant while Xardorok is enlarged.

action.name: Missil Èldritx (Truc)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany de força.

action.name: Enlarge (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: For 1 minute, Xardorok magically increases in size, along with anything he is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, Xardorok is Large, doubles his damage dice on Força-based weapon attacks (included in his attacks), and makes Força checks and Força saving throws with advantage. If Xardorok lacks the room to become Large, he attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

action.name: Invisibility {@recharge 4}
entries: Xardorok magically turns {@condition invisible} until he attacks, he casts a spell, he uses his Enlarge, or his concentration is broken (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment Xardorok wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with him.

reaction.name: Venjança dels Inferns (2/Dia)
entries: When Xardorok is damaged by a creature within 60 feet of him that he can see, the creature that damaged him is engulfed in hellish flames and ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

monster.name: Yeti Tyke
languages: understands Yeti però no pot parlar

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The yeti té avantatge a tirades de Saviesa (Percepció) que involucrin olor.

trait.name: Snow Camouflage
entries: The yeti has advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.
